summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation, authorizing the Superintendent to execute a grant agreement with the Seattle Housing Authority for a junior lifeguard apprenticeship program; increasing the expenditure allowance of the Department's 1995-96 budget; authorizing and ratifying certain expenditures; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park Fund therefor all upon a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
